video.title: Ghost Whisperer
video.synopsis: Possessing a lifelong ability to speak to the dead, reluctant medium Melinda Gordon struggles to help spirits address their lingering issues.

episodes.synopsis: The spirit of a soldier disturbs Melinda at her wedding.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Melinda must reunite a child's spirit with his family before another tragedy occurs, all while coping with a visit from her mother-in-law.
episodes.title: The Crossing

episodes.synopsis: A young girl is put into a psychiatric facility at the onset of strange behavior following her identical twin sister's death.
episodes.title: Ghost, Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: After Jim saves the life of a woman who attempts suicide in order to be with her deceased fiancé, Melinda tries to help the fiancé cross over.
episodes.title: Mended Hearts

episodes.synopsis: While cleaning the basement of an inn, Melinda finds the lost spirits of three boys who perished in an orphanage fire 50 years ago.
episodes.title: Lost Boys

episodes.synopsis: Melinda helps an upset teenage ghost and in the process learns something that will affect the lives of everyone this boy left behind.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: A woman who passed away during a routine pregnancy will not cross over until she can get her husband to stop blaming himself.
episodes.title: Hope and Mercy

episodes.synopsis: When Jim begins to act strangely, Melinda starts to believe that this change in his behavior might be caused by a tortured spirit.
episodes.title: On the Wings of a Dove

episodes.synopsis: Melinda finds a mother's lost spirit through electronic voice phenomenon, and then works with the woman to reconcile with her son.
episodes.title: Voices

episodes.synopsis: Melinda intervenes when the spirit of a woman who didn't make it through her wedding night begins terrorizing her husband's current fiancée.
episodes.title: Ghost Bride

episodes.synopsis: Melinda tries to reunite a father and son before a crucial decision is made.
episodes.title: Shadow Boxer

episodes.synopsis: Melinda encounters the spirit of a dead comedian who doesn't fully understand his current state of existence.
episodes.title: Undead Comic

episodes.synopsis: When a new neighbor moves in, he brings a ghost, and Melinda's attempts to reach the hostile spirit strain her relationship with Jim.
episodes.title: Friendly Neighborhood Ghost

episodes.synopsis: The spirit of a man follows Melinda home from an art gallery and haunts her into getting in touch with his troubled daughter.
episodes.title: Last Execution

episodes.synopsis: Melinda remembers how her relationship with her mother was affected when she re-encounters the first ghost she ever saw.
episodes.title: Melinda's First Ghost

episodes.synopsis: One of Andrea's friends has gone missing while on a hike. She enlists Melinda to help find her friend.
episodes.title: Dead Man's Ridge

episodes.synopsis: While shopping for antiques at a local home, Melinda encounters the spirit of a malicious young boy who is terrorizing his family.
episodes.title: Demon Child

episodes.synopsis: When a traveling circus brings with it the spirit of a man who thinks his brother murdered him, Melinda tries to help the ghost find peace.
episodes.title: Miss Fortune

episodes.synopsis: Melinda must help the restless ghost of an African American man who was attacked and killed by a white co-worker in the 1970s.
episodes.title: Fury

episodes.synopsis: A head injury caused by an accident puts Melinda's abilities at risk, and she must deal with the possibility of permanently losing her gift.
episodes.title: The Vanishing

episodes.synopsis: When the spirits of a pilot and a flight attendant contact her, Melinda realizes that a plane is going to crash.
episodes.title: Free Fall

episodes.synopsis: Melinda meets an evil spirit while helping crash victims.
episodes.title: The One

episodes.synopsis: Melinda battles with Wide Brim Man for Andrea's soul, and her chance encounter with a reporter piques the interest of a mysterious man.
episodes.title: Love Never Dies

episodes.synopsis: Melinda has to deal with an ex and a shoplifting teen who isn't sure why he's committing the crime.
episodes.title: Love Still Won't Die

episodes.synopsis: A new friendship is jeopardized when Melinda becomes involved with a young girl haunting a newly purchased home.
episodes.title: Drowned Lives

episodes.synopsis: A ghost who keeps causing an ornament to reappear is particularly challenging for Melinda to communicate with.
episodes.title: The Ghost Within

episodes.synopsis: A ghost who has been buried incorrectly triggers painful memories for Melinda, who is also having difficulty bonding with Delia.
episodes.title: Grave Matter

episodes.synopsis: A dream sends Melinda to her mother on the eve of surgery, but the dream transfers to Jim and he must find a way to help a ghost he can't see.
episodes.title: The Woman Of His Dreams

episodes.synopsis: When Jim unknowingly tricks Melinda into her first camping trip, she's distracted from the creature discomforts by a ghost looking for her daughter.
episodes.title: A Vicious Cycle

episodes.synopsis: A ghost who sets fires threatens Melinda, and the Professor drops by with questions.
episodes.title: The Night We Met

episodes.synopsis: A musician who believes he's been cursed has a much more complex problem that Melinda must help him solve.
episodes.title: The Curse Of The Ninth

episodes.synopsis: Melinda must help a ghost find the truth before he damages a baseball player.
episodes.title: Giving Up The Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Melinda tries to rescue a woman driven by guilt, and Professor Payne presses her for answers.
episodes.title: Cat's Claw

episodes.synopsis: Melinda has trouble talking to a ghost, only to find he is in a coma, and his family are in a legal battle to take him off of life support.
episodes.title: Dead to Rights

episodes.synopsis: Multiple ghosts begin to affect Melinda's equilibrium as she desperately searches for a way to help them and discover who they are.
episodes.title: Déjà Boo

episodes.synopsis: Melinda encounters the ghost of a race car driver who is determined to avenge his death. Following the clues, she learns that Delia's son is involved.
episodes.title: Speed Demon

episodes.synopsis: A series of accidents thins the local cheerleading squad and puts their championship at stake, and Melinda has to get to the truth.
episodes.title: Mean Ghost

episodes.synopsis: A victim of the same jewelry store robbery comes to Melinda for help, but things aren't as he says and Melinda's life may be in jeopardy.
episodes.title: The Cradle Will Rock

episodes.synopsis: When a body disappears from the morgue, Melinda and Jim go hunting and find what Professor Payne posits to be a zombie -- except it isn't that easy.
episodes.title: The Walk-In

episodes.synopsis: Melinda and Jim become foster parents to help a girl who's been abandoned by her mother.
episodes.title: Children Of Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Delia and Ned have a ghost attached to them.
episodes.title: Delia's First Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Melinda comes across another ghost whisperer, and he may have some answers for her about shifts in the spirit world -- but they could be costly.
episodes.title: The Collector

episodes.synopsis: Melinda begins having visions that seem to predict the death of a loved one.
episodes.title: The Prophet

episodes.synopsis: Ethan Clark puts Melinda in touch with some children who may hold the answer, but Gabriel continues to threaten her and those she loves.
episodes.title: The Gathering

episodes.synopsis: A ghost from underground blames Melinda for a death she had nothing to do with, and a blogger begins sniffing around her and Professor Payne.
episodes.title: The Underneath

episodes.synopsis: The Bloody Mary urban legend is revived at the university when a girl goes into a coma, and Melinda must determine if there's truth to the tale.
episodes.title: Don't Try This At Home

episodes.synopsis: A veteran comes home haunted by his unit, and Melinda has trouble connecting with them.
episodes.title: Haunted Hero

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a ghost who's stalking an up-and-coming lawyer, Melinda gets a stalker of her own.
episodes.title: No Safe Place

episodes.synopsis: Gabriel returns with pieces of Melinda's past that lead her to discover a deeply buried secret of the town.
episodes.title: Weight Of What Was

episodes.synopsis: Melinda helps a professor whose actions are why she's being haunted, and Jim considers a new career.
episodes.title: Double Exposure

episodes.synopsis: Melinda meets a so-called sensitive she's sure is a fake, but she has to work with him when a ghost leads her to the family he's conning.
episodes.title: Unhappy Medium

episodes.synopsis: Melinda tries to protect a father and daughter from ghosts who are controlling them, and Delia voices her doubts when things get too close to home.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Melinda try help a runaway who is being haunted by a ghost who won't leave, but first the girl has to come to terms with her gift.
episodes.title: All Ghosts Lead to Grandview

episodes.synopsis: Melinda deals with a ghost who thinks he's Santa Claus, and his motives may not be pure.
episodes.title: Holiday Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Melinda has to gain the trust of Ned's classmate to learn why he's causing mayhem at the high school and to solve the mystery of her brother's death.
episodes.title: Slam

episodes.synopsis: Melinda believes Jim is being haunted by the ghost of a man he tried to save, and all Jim wants to do is somehow communicate his remorse.
episodes.title: First Do No Harm

episodes.synopsis: Ned asks for Melinda's help when he is injured by what appears to be a malicious ghost that's haunting his new girlfriend.
episodes.title: Home But Not Alone

episodes.synopsis: Justin Yates is back and tormenting Melinda, but as she researches more of his life she finds a mystery that may save him.
episodes.title: The Gravesitter

episodes.synopsis: Melinda is caught up in an investigation about a film student who died while shooting a horror flick.
episodes.title: Horror Show

episodes.synopsis: An old acquaintance of Rick Payne's comes to town, and Melinda helps him deal with the resentful ghost of his wife.
episodes.title: Deadbeat Dads

episodes.synopsis: Melinda's father comes back into her life, and she must solve the mystery of where he's been and how it relates to a young ghost who won't cross over.
episodes.title: Stranglehold

episodes.synopsis: Melinda searches for Paul Eastman and answers from her mother about her father.
episodes.title: Pater Familias

episodes.synopsis: Melinda's anger with Rick Payne is put on the back burner when she meets Eli, another instructor who has the very same abilities she does.
episodes.title: Firestarter

episodes.synopsis: Melinda faces bad memories from school when one of her former classmates is found dead, and Eli takes the opportunity for some on-the-job training.
episodes.title: Big Chills

episodes.synopsis: A ghost who has managed to recreate himself in the gaming world threatens Melinda when she tries to determine who he is.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: What's supposed to be a relaxing cruise turns into a murder mystery when Melinda and Jim try to determine why a ghost is feeding on a passenger.
episodes.title: Save Our Souls

episodes.synopsis: A classmate of Ned's begins haunting a former best friend, and Melinda must find out why she's so angry before another tragedy occurs.
episodes.title: Bloodline

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Melinda's participation in a friend's wedding brings a change to their own relationship.
episodes.title: Imaginary Friends and Enemies

episodes.synopsis: Jim struggles over what he's supposed to do, and Melinda tries to help a teenage ghost while dealing with her grief.
episodes.title: Threshold

episodes.synopsis: Melinda tries to reach Jim while dealing with Sam's family and a ghost that's determined to punish her.
episodes.title: Heart and Soul

episodes.synopsis: Melinda has to put her worries over Sam aside when the dangerous ghost of a young girl appears at his job site.
episodes.title: Pieces of You

episodes.synopsis: Melinda struggles to help a spirit who can't remember anything, and she endangers her life trying to prevent another tragedy.
episodes.title: Ball and Chain

episodes.synopsis: Delia's newest house listing turns out to be haunted, and Melinda must uncover a lie before a second family tragedy occurs.
episodes.title: Life on the Line

episodes.synopsis: Melinda goes on a road trip with Sam as he tries to reconnect with his old girlfriend, and a ghost from high school takes up residence at Delia's.
episodes.title: This Joint's Haunted

episodes.synopsis: Melinda and Eli try to reach ghosts who are angry that their bodies have been found in a lake.
episodes.title: Body of Water

episodes.synopsis: Melinda finds out how hard it is to date someone who doesn't know about her gift after a spirit interrupts an important date.
episodes.title: Slow Burn

episodes.synopsis: Eli's attempt to relieve Melinda of ghost duty so she can pursue romance goes awry when a hazing stunt turns deadly.
episodes.title: Greek Tragedy

episodes.synopsis: Melinda struggles to find the right time to tell Sam her secret, and the appearance of a "ghost buster" makes it very difficult.
episodes.title: Ghost Busted

episodes.synopsis: Sam gets a little more than he bargained for when he spends time with Melinda so he can get used to her extremely unusual world.
episodes.title: Delusions of Grandview

episodes.synopsis: Jim's memory returns and he's reunited with Melinda.
episodes.title: Leap of Faith

episodes.synopsis: Melinda and Eli try to help a young woman who is being haunted by an angry ghost, but the woman's refusal to tell the truth may endanger her life.
episodes.title: Thrilled to Death

episodes.synopsis: A ghost is causing troubles at a shoot for a soap opera -- unfortunately for Melinda, the filming is occurring in her store.
episodes.title: Stage Fright

episodes.synopsis: A haunted dollhouse may endanger a family that believes voodoo is keeping them safe, and Melinda searches for her missing wedding rings.
episodes.title: Cursed

episodes.synopsis: A teenager is enthralled by a ghost who's tapped into her vampire fantasies, and Melinda must act before the girl becomes a ghost herself.
episodes.title: Endless Love

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Melinda's wedding is overtaken by an ambitious wedding planner while Melinda deals with dreams that seem to threaten her child.
episodes.title: The Book of Changes

episodes.synopsis: Melinda must discover the strange truth hidden within a new family before the secret tears apart everyone involved.
episodes.title: Birthday Presence

episodes.synopsis: Melinda deals with a ghost who is intent on spreading misery because she believes an email caused her death and her mother's coma.
episodes.title: See No Evil

episodes.synopsis: While trying to give Aiden a normal childhood and help him deal with his gift, Melinda finds herself battling a ghost for his life.
episodes.title: 'Til Death Do Us Start

episodes.synopsis: When the ghost of a teenager accuses a Grandview cop of murdering him, Melinda is convinced that his death wasn't a mere skateboarding accident.
episodes.title: Do Over

episodes.synopsis: When a ghost dressed as a clown begins haunting Melinda's house, she must look for answers in the ghost's final case as a private investigator.
episodes.title: Cause for Alarm

episodes.synopsis: A ghost who knows of a hidden munitions dump with unexploded bombs confides in Melinda that one of those bombs is missing and in the wrong hands.
episodes.title: Head Over Heels

episodes.synopsis: A haunted morgue at Jim's hospital begins to scare the staff, and Eli may be experiencing a little too much one-on-one time with his mother.
episodes.title: Devil's Bargain

episodes.synopsis: Melinda is pulled into a murder mystery by a real estate power couple when a ghost leads her to his own corpse.
episodes.title: Dead Listing

episodes.synopsis: A routine estate sale lands Melinda in the center of dark forces battling for the soul of a little girl who's trapped in a violently haunted house.
episodes.title: Lost in the Shadows

episodes.synopsis: The Headless Horseman from The Legend of Sleepy Hollow is haunting Melinda, and she soon becomes worried for Aiden's safety.
episodes.title: Excessive Forces

episodes.synopsis: Melinda must help Ned stop a vengeful ghost when the Grandview radio station broadcasts the humiliating secrets that led to his death.
episodes.title: Dead Air

episodes.synopsis: When a fun night out turns dangerous for three teens, Melinda investigates a kidnapping that may put her in more danger than she anticipated.
episodes.title: Blessings in Disguise

episodes.synopsis: When the ghost of a little girl who passed away from leukemia befriends Aiden, Melinda begins to worry for her son's safety.
episodes.title: Living Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: One of Ned's professors seems to be haunted by a secret admirer, and a Ouija board predicts that somebody is going to die.
episodes.title: Dead to Me

episodes.synopsis: When Aiden is put in danger, Melinda won't accept anything but the truth and sets out on an investigation into the life of an angry murdered ghost.
episodes.title: Implosion

episodes.synopsis: Strange things start happening to a famous graphic artist when Melinda tries to solve the mystery of who is trying to stop his work.
episodes.title: Old Sins Cast Long Shadows

episodes.synopsis: After Eli's father dies, he refuses to cross over without first seeing his wife, opening up a Pandora's box of complications.
episodes.title: On Thin Ice

episodes.synopsis: When the ghost Melinda is trying to help suddenly turns up alive, she finds herself in the middle of a dangerous revenge plot.
episodes.title: Dead Eye

episodes.synopsis: After Melinda discovers a family secret, madness grips the town when a ghost who is making no sense haunts a patient who's making even less.
episodes.title: Lethal Combination

episodes.synopsis: Eli's new client is very rich and paranoid -- with good cause, it turns out, because he has a ghost that Melinda must help cross over.
episodes.title: Blood Money

episodes.synopsis: Jim, surprised by his colleague's nonchalance to a paranormal encounter, suspects that he is involved in a med student's sudden disappearance.
episodes.title: Dead Ringer

episodes.synopsis: Melinda's investigation of a poltergeist in the hospital leads to a showdown with supernatural forces terrorizing her and her son.
episodes.title: The Children's Parade
